cards.name: Sandgun
cards.description:
Innate Retain bundlecore:Quickdraw.
Lose 3 HP.
Deal 5 (10) damage and apply 1 bundlecore:Suffocation 2 times.
Soulbound bundlecore:Undying.

relics.name: Crow's Calling
relics.description:
Upon pickup, obtain all key pieces.
Gain [E] at the start of your turn and draw  additional card.
bundlecore:Quest - Mazaleth bundlecore:Destiny.
bundlecore:Keybane - Void
bundlecore:Keybane - Void.
relics.flavorText: A token used to access the secret floor of the spire, apparently the cultists have succeeded in reincarnating their crow god, Mazaleth, you should investigate.

relics.name: Bottle Cleaner
relics.description: When you discard a potion, gain a potion slot.
relics.flavorText: It gets it right in there.

relics.name: Fan Mail
relics.description:
After playing a large number of cards with bundlecore:Cardmod destroy this relic and obtain a random rare relic.
If you get lucky you might find something special instead.
relics.flavorText: We just got a letter...

relics.name: Modification Kit
relics.description:
Attack cards with a bundlecore:Cardmod have 1 more damage.
After playing a Skill with a bundlecore:Cardmod gain 1 Block.
relics.flavorText: With the correct tools, no job is too tough for a spire climber!

relics.name: Pho
relics.description:
Upon pickup, gain 3 Max HP.
At the start of your turn, gain 1 bundlecore:Fire_Breathing.
relics.flavorText: A very spicy and meaty eat that is great for getting over bumps and bruises.

relics.name: Concentrated Bottled Force
relics.description:
Upon pickup, chose a card.
This card gains Retain, bundlecore:Quickdraw and Exhaustive 2.
relics.flavorText: A bottle filled with distilled force brew, it seems to have a more reliable effect... thankfully...

relics.name: Tiny Dew
relics.description: Every fourth time you drink a potion, obtain a common relic.
relics.flavorText: A pure crystalline drop. It can mold into other forms if given the vapours from your potions.

relics.name: Brewcycler
relics.description:
The first 2 times you discard a potion each combat, add a random potion to the rewards.
It can be of Legendary rarity.
Occasionally produces something Odd.
relics.flavorText: Ever wondered whats inside the box? Looks like someone has been using it to blend potions, why don't you try it?

relics.name: Cursed Mirror
relics.description: The first time you play a card with a bundlecore:Cardmod each turn, add a duplicate of the card to the bottom of your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: I can see the better half of... me?

relics.name: Draught of Duality
relics.description: Every 10 times you play a card with a bundlecore:Cardmod, draw 1 card and gain [E].
relics.flavorText: Greater than the sum of its parts.

relics.name: Mana Cloak
relics.description:
When you use a potion, gain [E].
If you have a potion and take unblocked attack damage, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies and apply 1 Weak to them.
relics.flavorText: A refreshing cloak that can help extract the hidden potential of your draughts.

relics.name: Radiant Circlet
relics.description:
There are no quest relics available.
At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.
relics.flavorText: You can unlock more quest relics by completing existing quests, most quests are tied to specific bundles.

relics.name: Ancient Meteorite
relics.description:
Upon pickup, raise your maximum hand size by 1.
At the start of your turn, lose [E] and draw 5 cards.
relics.flavorText: Food for a giant green dragon, not for you!

relics.name: Awakening Wheel
relics.description:
When you play a Power card gain 2 Strength.
After playing 13 powers that cost 1 or more in one combat, gain Truest Power.
relics.flavorText: Collected feathers apparently from the crow god Mazaleth, it being haphazardly slewn around the spire does not bode well.

relics.name: Bifurkite
relics.description: The first time you play a card with a bundlecore:Cardmod each turn, gain [E].
relics.flavorText: This is getting out of hand, now there are two of them!

relics.name: Brand of the Collector
relics.description:
Before the start of combat, gain 1 Weak, Vulnerable and Frail.
At the start of your turn, gain [E].
Boss fights contain a dangerous Brazier.
bundlecore:Quest - Collector bundlecore:Destiny.
bundlecore:Keybane - Burn.
relics.flavorText: The collector is rumoured to be the buyer of the stolen potion schematics, with this brand you can find her hideout...

relics.name: Card Update
relics.description: Permanently apply a special upgrade, bundlecore:MK2, to ALL non Status, non Curse cards.
relics.flavorText: Hello this flavour text panel has been trying to reach you about your mod's extended update schedule...

relics.name: Cheese Board
relics.description:
Upon pickup gain 1 Potion Slot.
All hallway fights now give a bonus potion reward, even special rarity ones.
Potions are 20% stronger, with their potency increasing by at least 1.
Potions grant 1 Max HP on use.
relics.flavorText: Includes a wine glass to put a potion in! The meal complements your potions perfectly.

relics.name: Curse of the Peglin King
relics.description:
bundlecore:Rare.
Upon pickup, gain 1 Potion Slot.
At the start of your turn, add a Miracle to the top of your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Half of the time you feel full of energy, half of the time you feel slow. This odd artifact also has a slot in the back for a night cap.

relics.name: Defresh Potion
relics.description:
bundlecore:Rare
Upon pickup, raise your maximum hand size by 2.
At the start of your turn, gain [E][E] and draw 3 cards.
ALL CARDS EXHAUST.
relics.flavorText: As you drink from the potion you feel your memory begin to fade... It never returns...

relics.name: Delicious Deca
relics.description:
Upon pickup, lose 1 Max HP.
At the start of your turn, gain [E] but ALL enemies gain 2 Plated Armor.
bundlecore:Quest - Deca bundlecore:Destiny.
bundlecore:Keybane - Wound.
relics.flavorText: A forsaken treat that Deca created by putting concrete sprinkles ontop of a donut... Probably not safe to eat, but you will try anyway.

relics.name: Emerald Feast
relics.description:
At the start of your turn, gain [E][E].
At the start of combat, ALL enemies gain 3 Strength, Plated Armor and 16 Block.
relics.flavorText: 50 Onion rings not included.

relics.name: Magma Skull
relics.description:
bundlecore:Rare.
Upon pickup, gain 2 potion slots.
When you use a potion that isn't a bundlecore:Lava_Potion, gain a Lava Potion.
Elite fights drop two extra potions.
relics.flavorText: Overflowing with real lava, try putting it in those empty potion bottles!

relics.name: Mod Soup
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain [E] and Force a card in your hand to become bundlecore:Soupy.
relics.flavorText: Too many chefs added to the broth, i mean who let them cook like this.

relics.name: Philosuppliers Stone
relics.description:
ALL cards gain bundlecore:Supplier.
At the start of combat, gain [E].
At the start of turn 2 and onwards, lose [E] and increase this loss by 1.
relics.flavorText: A truly energetic and radiant artefact that helps you outmaneuver your enemies!

relics.name: Pumpkin Pie
relics.description:
Upon pickup, gain 6 Max HP and raise your maximum hand size by 2.
At the start of combat, gain [E][E][E] and draw 5 cards.
relics.flavorText: It tastes so great, but can only fill you up for a disappointingly short period of time.

relics.name: Red Royal Gel
relics.description: At the start of combat, Channel 3 bundlecore:Slimes.
relics.flavorText: The collective congealment of two slime kings, this potent gel crown will keep slimes in check.

relics.name: Singularity
relics.description:
bundlecore:Rare
Cards are 65% stronger, which can round up, but Exhaust.
relics.flavorText: The end is nigh...

relics.name: Temporal Timepiece
relics.description:
At the start of combat gain Time Warp.
At the end of your turn, gain [E][E] next turn.
bundlecore:Quest - Time Eater bundlecore:Destiny.
bundlecore:Keybane - Dazed.
relics.flavorText: The potion seller has reported that thieves have been using time distorting watches to rob her stashes, it seems this one was left behind...

relics.name: Pot of Marmalade Tea
relics.description:
Heal 6 HP and gain 1 Max HP on pickup.
At the start of your turn, a random card in hand is Forced to gain bundlecore:Supplier.
relics.flavorText: Sweet yet astringent, it can take a while to get past the strong taste.

relics.name: Stimulant R
relics.description:
When you drink a potion, enter Wrath.
Synergy: bundlecore:Mageblood_Stimulant_R.
relics.flavorText: Used by the Thieves guild to make a quick getaway, those without protective enchantments will become insane upon consumption

potions.name: Lava Potion
potions.flavor: Good thing the bottle is thermally insulated!
potions.description: Deal 20 damage and apply 4 On Fire to the target.

keywords.name: After Image
keywords.description: Whenever you play a card, gain Block.

keywords.name: Ambitious Autumn
keywords.description: A relic inspired by Autumn, Creator of many innovative mods, including Chimera Cards.

keywords.name: Antifact
keywords.description: The next time a creature with antifact tries to gain a buff, it will be negated.

keywords.name: Artisan Alchyr
keywords.description: A relic inspired by Alchyr, creator of many mods including the character mod Astrologer.

keywords.name: Better Boomer
keywords.description: A relic inspired by Mindbomber, also known as Boomer, creator of Fractal Chronometer.

keywords.name: Blank Blank
keywords.description: A relic inspired by Blank, Kotlin enthusiast and creator of Infinite Spire, the definitive endless mode expansion.

keywords.name: Blazing Bryan
keywords.description: A relic inspired by Bryan, creator of the FireBlade character mod. "WHARGH".

keywords.name: Cardmod
keywords.description: Cardmods are additional properties that can be applied to cards, they can be either temporary or permanent like Chimera Modifiers.

keywords.name: Champion Of Collecting
keywords.description: This relic only spawns naturally after surviving Colossal Collector The Crowning on Ascension 20.

keywords.name: Champion Of Deca
keywords.description: This relic only spawns naturally after surviving Wide Daddy Deca The Beta on Ascension 20 without activating Final Prism.

keywords.name: Champion Of Donu
keywords.description: This relic only spawns naturally after defeating Wide Daddy Donu The Omega on Ascension 20.

keywords.name: Champion Of Time
keywords.description: This relic only spawns naturally after surviving Titanic Time Eater The Tocking on Ascension 20.

keywords.name: Choke
keywords.description: Whenever you play a card this turn, the enemy loses HP.

keywords.name: Creative Canvas
keywords.description: A relic inspired by Modding veteran Vex. Suitable Vex art included.

keywords.name: Day
keywords.description:
Monday: Gain [E][E] next turn.
Tuesday: Draw 2 cards next turn.
Wednesday: Exhume a card and Upgrade it.
Thursday: Draw 3 cards and discard 3 cards.
Friday: Gain 1 Ritual.
Saturday: Gain 8 block.
Sunday: Apply 1 Weak, Vulnerable and Constricted to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Defeated Collector
keywords.description: This relic only spawns naturally after surviving Colossal Collector The Crowning.

keywords.name: Defeated Deca
keywords.description: This relic only spawns naturally after surviving Wide Daddy Deca The Beta.

keywords.name: Defeated Donu
keywords.description: This relic only spawns naturally after defeating Wide Daddy Donu The Omega.

keywords.name: Defeated Time
keywords.description: This relic only spawns naturally after surviving Titanic Time Eater The Tocking.

keywords.name: Definitive Darkglade
keywords.description: A relic inspired by Darkglade, creator of the act mods Gensokyo and Ruina.

keywords.name: Destiny
keywords.description: A quest that ends with a final boss in act 4.

keywords.name: Elegant Enbeon
keywords.description: A relic inspired by Enbeon, aspiring mod creator and maker of many packs in Packmaster.

keywords.name: Fire Breathing
keywords.description: When you draw a Status or Curse card, deals damage to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Fox Fanatic
keywords.description: A relic inspired by MTS bot creator and fox appreciator Nelly. Feel free to provide foxes in odding-technical.

keywords.name: Great GK
keywords.description: A relic inspired by GK, creator of many great mods such as Minty Spire and Spicy Shops.

keywords.name: Heavily Confused
keywords.description: When you draw cards whilst heavily confused, their cost is shuffled and may be increased up to a maximum of 3 but will never be lower than the base cost.

keywords.name: Hour
keywords.description:
Odd morning: Duplicate 2 random cards.
Even morning: Transform Ascenders Bane into two Necronomicurse or gain two Ascender's Bane.
Odd afternoon: Lose 20% of your maximum health.
Even afternoon: Randomly remove 2 cards.
3am: Add Curse Of The Bell to your deck, except on the 13th day of the month and if its a friday instead obtain a special relic.

keywords.name: Jeery Jerry
keywords.description: A relic inspired by Jerry, creator of the modpack Bad Spire.

keywords.name: Jolly Johnny
keywords.description: A relic inspired by Johnny Bazooka, Creator of character mod The Blackbeard.

keywords.name: Jovial Jedi
keywords.description: A relic inspired by Jedi, creator of mods including the content mod Jedi Mod.

keywords.name: Keybane
keywords.description: When you obtain the third key piece or if you have them before pickup, obtain the linked Status card.

keywords.name: Kind Kio
keywords.description: A relic inspired by Kio, I can guarantee you are playing with at least three of their mods right now!

keywords.name: Last Light
keywords.description: A relic inspired by Last Light, creator of an older mod by the same name.

keywords.name: Lava Potion
keywords.description: Potion: Deal 25 damage to the target and apply 5 On Fire.

keywords.name: Lighthearted Laugic
keywords.description: A relic inspired by Laugic, a funny modder and creator of character mods The Vacant and The Conductor.

keywords.name: MK2
keywords.description: This cards values are increased by 1/6th with no downside.

keywords.name: Mageblood Cheese
keywords.description: While you have the relic Mageblood, another potion will be added to all combat rewards.

keywords.name: Mageblood Lava
keywords.description: While you have the relic Mageblood, apply 4 On Fire to ALL enemies before the start of combat for each potion slot.

keywords.name: Mageblood Stimulant R
keywords.description: While you have the relic Mageblood, enter Divinity at the start of combat if your potion slots are all full.

keywords.name: Magic
keywords.description: Most of a cards secondary values are "Magic".

keywords.name: Magical Modargo
keywords.description: A relic inspired by Modargo, creator of the three arcanic act mods Menagerie, Elementarium and Abyss.

keywords.name: Merchants Respect
keywords.description: This relic only spawns naturally after confronting the potion thieves on Ascension 20.

keywords.name: Metallicize
keywords.description: At the end of your turn, gain block.

keywords.name: Mighty Micheal
keywords.description: A relic inspired by Michael Mayhem, a game developer and developer of Downfall.

keywords.name: Monster Masher
keywords.description: A relic created with the Snecko bot and the directions of Jack Renoson, creator of Trophy Hunter.

keywords.name: On Fire
keywords.description: At the start of this creatures turn, On Fire is increased by 1 then it will lose HP. Damage is doubled if the target is Vulnerable.

keywords.name: Optimistic Ocean
keywords.description: A relic inspired by Ocean, Creator of the QoL pack Ocean's Pencil Case.

keywords.name: Perfecting Pandemonium
keywords.description: A relic inspired by Pandemonium, creator of many mods that enhance basegame aspects, like Spire Locations.

keywords.name: Potionbrewer's Permit
keywords.description: This relic only spawns naturally after confronting the potion thieves and living to tell the tale.

keywords.name: Quest
keywords.description:
You may only have 1 Quest relic at a time.
Completing this Quest will unlock new relics if it has not been done before.
Completing the quest on A20+ will unlock more items.

keywords.name: Quickdraw
keywords.description: When this card is drawn, draw 1 more card.

keywords.name: Rare
keywords.description: Spawns less often than other Relics of its type.

keywords.name: Scaley Silver
keywords.description: A relic inspired by Silver, creator of the character mod The Justicar.

keywords.name: Slime
keywords.description:
Passive: At the end of your turn deal damage to a random enemy (Base: 1).
Orb damage affected by Strength, Dexterity and Focus.
Evoke: Gain 1 Orb slot and Channel this Orb.

keywords.name: Slow
keywords.description: Target takes 10% more damage for each stack additively, resets to 0 each turn and increases by 1 when a card is played.

keywords.name: Soup
keywords.description: Card applies (#b1) modifier to every card in hand.

keywords.name: Spicy SandTag
keywords.description: A relic inspired by... oh wait...

keywords.name: Stun
keywords.description: Stunned enemies skip their turn.

keywords.name: Suffocation
keywords.description: Creature loses 5HP at the start of its turn for each.

keywords.name: Supplier
keywords.description:
Cards with supplier cost [E] more but give [E] [E] next turn.
Curses and Statuses become playable for 0.
Cannot be put on Unplayable regular cards.

keywords.name: Undying
keywords.description: When this card would exhaust, an equal copy appears back in your hand.

augments.name: Conclusive
augments.description: Card values increased by 35%. Card ends your turn.

augments.name: Normal
augments.description:
Card values +#b35%.
Card can only be played if less than 2(#b3+) other cards have been played this turn.

augments.name: Forbidden
augments.description: Card values increased by 35%. Card gains Purge.

augments.name: Ringing
augments.description:
All values multiplied by 2.
A Curse of the Bell is added to the draw pile at the start of combat.

augments.name: Performance of
augments.description:
Card values +#b50%.
Card gains Opener.

augments.name: 's Flashbang
augments.description:
Cost increased by 1.
Card applies Stun to the target for 1 turn but gains Purge.

augments.name: 's Brewery
augments.description:
Sponsored by Frost Prime Industries.
Card gives a potion on use but makes you lose 6(#r5)HP when played.

augments.name: Unstable
augments.description: Values increased by attached relic (#b1.65x) but this modifier will persist if the relic is lost.

augments.name: Overextended
augments.description:
Values are multiplied by 3.
On play gives 99(#b3) Weak, Frail and Vulnerable.

augments.name: Fractalus
augments.description:
Card values -#b20%.
On play an ethereal copy without this Cardmod is added to your hand.

augments.name: 's Cantrip
augments.description: Draws 1(#b2) cards on play but has Exhaustive 3.

augments.name: Venomous
augments.description:
Damage -#b50%.
Applies Choke equal to unblocked damage.

augments.name: 's Fart
augments.description:
Card gains Exhaust.
Applies 1(#b2) poison at the start of turn to ALL enemies after being played.

augments.name: Soupy
augments.description: Card applies 1 new modifier to every card in hand.

augments.name: Orby
augments.description:
This card is considered an Orb.
Card gains a Crit effect of gaining [E][E] and drawing 4 cards.

augments.name: Choking
augments.description:
Cost increased by 1.
Card makes enemies take 6(#b8+) more damage when you play a card this turn.

augments.name: 's Booty
augments.description:
Cost increases by 1.
Gain 10(#b15) gold at the start of combat.

augments.name: Painful
augments.description:
Cost -#b1.
Adds an Wound to the draw pile.

augments.name: 's Screens?!
augments.description:
Card gains Ethereal.
Card will Scry 1(#b2), draw and discard 1(#b2) and return 1 card from the discard pile on play.

augments.name: Foxy
augments.description:
Cost +#b1.
Card gives 2(#b3+) Dexterity on play but Exhausts.
Modders love foxes.

augments.name: 's Fried Chicken
augments.description:
Cost increases by 1.
Card gives 4(#b6)HP when played and Exhausts.

augments.name: Scalding
augments.description:
Cost -#b1.
Adds a Burn to the discard pile.

augments.name: Slimy
augments.description:
Cost decreased by 1.
Adds a Slimed to the discard pile on play.

augments.name: Chaotic Capacitor
augments.description: Card gives 1 Orb slot and its filled with a random orb. Card now Exhausts.

augments.name: Bottled
augments.description: Card gains Quickdraw, Retain and Exhaustive 2.

augments.name: 's Shopping
augments.description: Card gives 1HP and 1(#b3) gold when played.

mods.name: Bundle Of Bundles
mods.description: Contains all of the config options and compatibility support for bundles.
